embeddings._comment: Provider options: 'auto' (Mnemosyne → OpenAI → keyword), 'mnemosyne', 'openai', 'keyword'. Default 'auto' uses Mnemosyne BGE-large if available (free, local, no API key needed).

semanticMatching._comment: Semantic matching uses embeddings for intelligent agent selection. With Mnemosyne BGE-large (default), this is completely free and runs locally.
